Wallpaper is in

Wallpaper’s never been out. It’s been in since the Ming Dynasty. Line with wallpaper and you go from bland to beautiful in a matter of hours. Wallpaper can be bold, neutral, calming, lively or textural, quickly and inexpensively transforming a room. Put your wallcovering project in the hands of a seasoned, reputable expert.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ module_class=”gq_r_inline_buttons” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”6px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ max_width=”100%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.0″ min_height=”270px”]

To hang it or not to hang it yourself, that is the question 

Hiring a professional installer can save you time, money, heartache and possibly even your relationship. DIY wallpaper installation is possible if you can happily live with a few flaws. But, would you really like to have those mistakes displayed on your walls for years to come?

The wallpaper hangers Auckland homeowners call for walls they can live with.

If you want to live within walls with a flawless finish, then find a skilled professional like Jason Roxburgh to hang your wallpaper for you. The job will be completed to very high standards, and you’ll live with walls you can be proud of. 

As a professional installer, Jason also knows how to work with different types of wall coverings. Whether you want vinyl coated paper, embossed wallpaper, murals or natural textile wallcoverings, you can count on him having the know-how to get the job done right. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/wallpapering-quote/” button_text=”GET A QUOTE” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#003263″ button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” background_layout=”dark” button_bg_color_hover=”#003b84″ global_module=”33″ saved_tabs=”all” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#003b84″ button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”rgba(0,132,61,0.12)” background_color_gradient_direction=”168deg” custom_padding=”160px|||||” top_divider_style=”graph2″ top_divider_height=”145px”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.0″]

Feature walls and powder rooms are this Auckland paper hanger’s specialities and modern wallpaper and printing options offer you endless choices:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ max_width=”1283px” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”1283px”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Customized wallpaper ” url=”/emergency-plumber-wellington/” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#073675″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_color=”#00843d” text_orientation=”center”]

Add modern design elements and visual interest to a room through wall art or custom wall murals. Choose from artwork or get your own photos printed onto the paper for a truly personal touch.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Wallpaper or paint ” url=”/emergency-plumber-wellington/” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#073675″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_color=”#00843d” text_orientation=”center”]

You don’t have to choose. Painting a room and adding a feature wall adds personality and interest, or you can paint anaglypta or embossed wallpaper for a textured, two-tone effect.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Vinyl wallpaper” url=”/emergency-plumber-wellington/” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#073675″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_color=”#00843d” text_orientation=”center”]

Vinyl is great for areas with a lot of moisture, such as kitchens and bathrooms. It can hide a multitude is sins, is scrubbable, long lasting and looks great, but a good finish takes a skilled installer.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Feature walls” url=”/emergency-plumber-wellington/” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#073675″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_color=”#00843d” text_orientation=”center”]

A cost-effective, easy way to update a room, an interesting wallcovering can highlight a fireplace or TV wall and a feature wall can replace a traditional headboard in the bedroom. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#003263″ custom_padding=”30px||2px|||” top_divider_color=”rgba(0,132,61,0.04)” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,50,99,0.77)” border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”rgba(0,50,99,0.77)”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ max_width=”805px” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”805px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%226%%” icon_color=”rgba(0,132,61,0.57)” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”42px” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ animation_style=”slide”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#00843d” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#00843d” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#00843d” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#00843d” header_5_font=”||||||||” header_5_text_color=”#00843d” header_6_font=”||||||||” header_6_text_color=”#00843d” header_6_font_size=”13px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-36px|||”]

What our customers say…

We are thrilled with our mural, and the installer (Jason) was just fantastic and turned up immediately to help out. 

Thanks again for another great job.

Toni Brown –    July 2020

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#003263″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,132,61,0.24)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,50,99,0.25)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.wallpaperhanger.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/wallpaper-auckland.jpg” custom_padding=”142px|||||” top_divider_style=”graph2″ bottom_divider_height=”149px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.0″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.68)” custom_margin=”-40px||-40px|” custom_padding=”40px|44px|43px|44px”]

Central Auckland wallpaper hanger

Whether you need hard-wearing wall coverings for your bathroom, or you want to make a stand-out feature wall in your living area or bedroom, when it comes to wallcoverings, Jason’s expertise is second to none. Are you looking for an expert wallpaper hanger with years of experience? Then get in touch with Jason Roxburgh now. 

Geometric patterns or custom mural papers require precise handling. Cutting around trims, aligning patterns around windows, irregular cuts in bathrooms and smoothing paper around protruding surfaces, twists and turns are his specialities. Jason treats every room as an art work and with his understanding of pattern, design, and layout, the result is always gorgeous and professional.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/wallpapering-quote/” button_text=”GET IN TOUCH” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#003263″ button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” background_layout=”dark” button_bg_color_hover=”#003b84″ global_module=”55″ saved_tabs=”all” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#003b84″ button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”45px|0px|27px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.0″]

Wallpaper has never looked so good

Wallpaper enlivens walls with textures or patterns or both. You can customise the image you want or choose from a number of the world’s best wallpaper designs. Wallpaper is not going out of style anytime soon, so incorporate it in your home beautifully.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/wallpapering-quote/” button_text=”GET IN TOUCH” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” Get the knowledge, tools, and expertise that will leave your place looking great. Call us for the wallpaper hangers Auckland homeowners have relied on for over 25 years. If you are outside central Auckland but would like a true professional to tackle your tricky wall hanging job, Jason still may be able to help.
